Token.Abstract: The data source of a TKCalendarMonthView object must adopt the TKCalendarMonthViewDataSource protocol.
A data source that will correspond to marks for the calendar month grid for a particular month.

Parameter.Name: startDate
Parameter.Abstract: The first date shown by the calendar month grid.

Parameter.Name: lastDate
Parameter.Abstract: The last date shown by the calendar month grid.

ReturnValue.Abstract: Returns an array of NSNumber objects corresponding the number of days specified in the start and last day parameters. Each NSNumber variable will give a int value that will be used to display dots under the day. The int value of each NSNumber indicates the number of dots.
